top_stories.title: US government takes 10 percent stake in Intel in exchange for money it was already on the hook for
top_stories.description: The US is investing $8.9 billion into Intel, but most of the funds come from money that the government was supposed to pay the embattled chipmaker anyway. In an announcement on Friday, Intel said the federal government will fund its investment using the remaining $5.7 billion in grants it hasn’t yet received under the Biden […]
top_stories.author: Emma Roth
top_stories.content: The US is investing $8.9 billion into Intel, but most of the funds come from money that the government was supposed to pay the embattled chipmaker anyway. In an announcement on Friday, Intel said the federal government will fund its investment using the remaining $5.7 billion in grants it hasn’t yet received under the Biden […]

top_stories.title: FieldAI Raises $405M to Scale Embodied AI Robotics
top_stories.description: Backing from Bezos Expeditions, Canaan Partners, Khosla Ventures, Prysm, Temasek, and others to accelerate commercial expansion of first risk-aware foundation models for robotics FieldAI, a leader in physical AI and robotic autonomy, today announced that it has raised $405 million in two consecutive rounds. Investors include Bezos Expeditions, BHP Ventures, Canaan Partners,... The post FieldAI Raises $405M to Scale Embodied AI Robotics first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
top_stories.author: PR Newswire
top_stories.content: Backing from Bezos Expeditions, Canaan Partners, Khosla Ventures, Prysm, Temasek, and others to accelerate commercial expansion of first risk-aware foundation models for robotics FieldAI, a leader in physical AI and robotic autonomy, today announced that it has raised $405 million in two consecutive rounds. Investors include Bezos Expeditions, BHP Ventures, Canaan Partners,... The post FieldAI Raises $405M to Scale Embodied AI Robotics first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: Google doubles down on ‘AI phones’ with its Pixel 10 series
top_stories.description: Google's updates to the Pixel 10 line allow it to showcase what its latest AI technology can do when enhanced by the Tensor G5 processor, an upgrade to the company's custom silicon designed for the AI experience.
top_stories.author: Sarah Perez
top_stories.content: Google's updates to the Pixel 10 line allow it to showcase what its latest AI technology can do when enhanced by the Tensor G5 processor, an upgrade to the company's custom silicon designed for the AI experience.

top_stories.title: Scaling domain expertise in complex, regulated domains
top_stories.description: Discover how Blue J is transforming tax research with AI-powered tools built on GPT-4.1. By combining domain expertise with Retrieval-Augmented Generation, Blue J delivers fast, accurate, and fully-cited tax answers—trusted by professionals across the US, Canada, and the UK.
top_stories.content: Discover how Blue J is transforming tax research with AI-powered tools built on GPT-4.1. By combining domain expertise with Retrieval-Augmented Generation, Blue J delivers fast, accurate, and fully-cited tax answers—trusted by professionals across the US, Canada, and the UK.

top_stories.title: Amazon SageMaker HyperPod enhances ML infrastructure with scalability and customizability
top_stories.description: In this post, we introduced three features in SageMaker HyperPod that enhance scalability and customizability for ML infrastructure. Continuous provisioning offers flexible resource provisioning to help you start training and deploying your models faster and manage your cluster more efficiently. With custom AMIs, you can align your ML environments with organizational security standards and software requirements.
top_stories.author: Mark Vinciguerra
top_stories.content: In this post, we introduced three features in SageMaker HyperPod that enhance scalability and customizability for ML infrastructure. Continuous provisioning offers flexible resource provisioning to help you start training and deploying your models faster and manage your cluster more efficiently. With custom AMIs, you can align your ML environments with organizational security standards and software requirements.
